The saints hope, and infalliblenes thereof. or Two sermons preached before the English companie at Middelb. about the moneth of October, 1608. Written by Mr. Iohne Forbes, at the earnest request of the hearers, and now published by them for the generall instruction and comfort of all Gods children Forbes, John, 1568?-1634.
126 p.
By Richard Schilders, Printed at Middelborough : 1610.
"The second sermon" has caption title; pagination and register continuous. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
